about_the_game:
JSM Party Themes features 6 incredible themes that can be used to bring an extra special touch to your characters. From mercenaries and wandering nomads to dreaming bards and royal queens, this pack is filled with memorable melodies.

This pack includes:

  • 6 looping OGG, M4A and MP3 themes
  • Tracks suitable for characters, but can also be used for towns, dungeons and battle
  • Royalty-free music to be used in your RPG Maker MV products

Tracklist:

The Dreamer
The General
The King Has Arrived
The Lonely Nomad
The Mercenary
The Royal Queen
